metadata.title: Arctic Ice Dynamics Joint Experiment - Ice Profile Sonar
metadata.description: On 7-10 April 1976, the submarine USS Gurnard participated in the Arctic Ice Dynamics Joint Experiment (AIDJEX) by traversing 777 nautical miles along 3 tracklines in the Beaufort Sea. The resulting data set of ice thickness data originated from upward-looking acoustical soundings (sonar). Data are ice profiles, including latitude/longitude, ping interval, surface beam diameter, number of data points and ice thickness.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Create  a data set to include  ice thickness data originated from upward-looking acoustical soundings (sonar). Data are ice profiles, including latitude/longitude, upping interval, surface beam diameter, number of data points and ice thickness in the Beaufort Sea.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown
